Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl

Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvisedDexMakerProxy
    Implementation of DexMakerProxy that provides AOP advice support for DexMaker-based proxies.
    AdvisedJdkDynamicProxy
    Implementation of JdkDynamicProxy that provides AOP advice support for proxies based on the JDK's Proxy.
    BasicJoinPoint
    Basic implementation of JoinPoint.
    BasicProceedingJoinPoint
    Basic implementation of ProceedingJoinPoint.
    CacheAspect
    Aspect containing advice used for cache abstraction.
    DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory
    AdvisedProxyFactory which creates AbstractProxy instances by determining the best implementation to use.
    GenericAspectTransformer
    Basic implementation of AspectTransformer.
    GenericPointcutBuilder
    Basic implementation of PointcutBuilder.
    ProxyingAspectWeaver
    Implementation of of AspectWeaver which uses proxies to advise objects.
    XmlAspectWrapper
    Wrapper for XmlAspect which adds additional AOP functionality.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl Description

Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
